title: UDL-Based Customized Online Learning Design for Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Requires applying UDL (Universal Design for Learning) with considerations for accessibility and flexibility in smartphone-centric learning environments.

learning_goals: Development of at least three nursing scenario-based learning materials aligned with UDL principles, considering diverse learning styles.
Achievement of over 80% proficiency in utilizing multimedia (text, audio, video) within an LMS.
Improvement of individual learning outcomes by over 20% through the design of a learner-customized feedback system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
